ygData.subject: Re: what should i be looking for now?
ygData.msgSnippet: thanks for the advice....comments below ... yep yep...need better bow! ... they just need to be in a main inventory slot, then you right click on them to get
ygData.messageBody:
thanks for the advice....comments below

David Rogers wrote:

> From: David Rogers <derogers334@...>
>
> --- Dan Leavy <dan@...> wrote:
> > level 30 dwarf warrior
> >
> > PGT
> > dragoon dirk
> > SBH
> > elm recurve bow => Ash or Oak as you like it set
> up. ---

yep yep...need better bow!



>
> > +1 str earrings => Gold-Amber (+3 STR) - these would be cool )
> > collar of undead prot => Spiked Collar (+3 STR) - ive got a spiked
> collar but went in favour of the undead one...with better AC

>
> > blackened helm => Bronze Helm or B.Iron Crown --- sorry i menat B iron
> crown, not blackened helm



>
> > grotesque mask
> > BS mantle
> > bronze tunic
> > barbed arms => Bronze Arms --- my barbed arms are only 1 ac less than
> bronze, but give +2 dex



>
> > bronze bracers => Bracers of Battle --- yeah ill have to look for
> these...was also thinking of erollisi bracer

>
> > lizardscale cloak => Bronze Cloak --- lizard is same Ac as bronze but
> lighter and plus 5 dex
> > bronze pants
> > blackened boots => Bronze or Dwarven Work Boots --- dwarven boots would
> be real cool...but they are so sought after and rare...i prefer the black
> ones over bronze as i can kick magic with them.



>
> > +5 agi rings
> > jboots => Or just wear these all the time. - -- i just leave these in
> an inventory slot as i dont need to wear them for the sow effect..only ac
> 1

>
>
> Question about the Journeyman's Boots. Do they
> enhance your speed just by wearing them, or do you
> have to burn a SOW charge out of them to get a speed
> increase?

they just need to be in a main inventory slot, then you right click on them
to get the sow...and they have unlimited charges...sow can only be cast
outdoors and lasts 20 mins...but you can cast on the move as well...


>
>
> Go all bronze on your character and start working on
> Rubicite or Mithril/Silvered Plate. Any items you're
> wearing that are chain equalivalent are holding you
> back; plate is a requirement to do really, really well
> at higher levels in melee.

yeah would love to go for rubi...mithril or silvered...just they are all so
camped...

i also only have about 300pp in the bank...i think this is way below what
most seem to have at level 30!! so im also trying to find a good place to
sit for hours and just gather plat and not worry about exp.

thanks again
Dan



>
